argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cphsca.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | cphsca.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_cphsca | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> ( *r ` F ) = ( *r ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` F ) e. _V |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_eqeltri | |- K e. _V |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( CCfld |`s K ) = ( CCfld |`s K ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cnfldcj | |- * = ( *r ` CCfld ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_ressstarv | |- ( K e. _V -> * = ( *r ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_ax-mp | |- * = ( *r ` ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 10 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> ( *r ` F ) = * ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ A e. K ) -> ( *r ` F ) = * ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ A e. K ) -> ( ( *r ` F ) ` A ) = ( * ` A ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_cphphl | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> W e. PreHil ) |
| 15 | 1 | #P_phlsrng | |- ( W e. PreHil -> F e. *Ring ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> F e. *Ring ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( *r ` F ) = ( *r ` F ) |
| 18 | 17, 2 | #P_srngcl | |- ( ( F e. *Ring /\ A e. K ) -> ( ( *r ` F ) ` A ) e. K ) |
| 19 | 16, 18 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ A e. K ) -> ( ( *r ` F ) ` A ) e. K ) |
| 20 | 13, 19 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ A e. K ) -> ( * ` A ) e. K ) |
